entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
